pages.text: The $(marked)Tattered Prince$() is an entity from the Halls of Carcosa.$(br)He possesses great power and is commonly found as an idol of worship. Dedicated Serfs usually summon him through the $(l:rites/golden_coronation)$(marked)Golden Coronation$(), as a conduit for further ascension.
Much like $(ml:bestiary/serfs)Yellow Serfs$(), he is very protective, and will cast powerful spells for defense.
